name: One Night At Pikachu's
description: One Night At Pikachu's Is a point-and-click survival horror video game based around the popular video game franchise Five Nights At Freddy's (FNAF For short). The main goal is to defend against 3 hostile animatronics  until 6AM during a night shift at a Pokemon Fan Club. The game only has 1 night, but is extremely hard. NOTE: This game does have some bugs :(
